mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, password, name, phone, email, create_dt, delete_yn) values(#{memberId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, now(), 'N')
mapper.select: select id, member_id, password, name, phone, email, create_dt, update_dt, delete_yn from member where member_id = #{memberId} and password = #{password} and delete_yn = 'N'
